entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who asked Fleur Delacour to go to the ball with him. He is shown to be fighting back a smile and looking sympathetic.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is described as the one who was asked by Ron to go to the ball with him. She is mentioned as being in the entrance hall talking to Diggory.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who is reacting to Ron's confession. He asks Ron what he did and seems surprised.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as the one who is trying to be sympathetic towards Ron. She pats his arm and looks like she is fighting back a smile.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is mentioned as being in the entrance hall talking to Fleur Delacour when Ron asked her to go to the ball with him.

relationships.description: Ron asked Fleur Delacour to go to the ball with him. This is described as something that 'sort of came over' Ron when he was walking past her in the entrance hall.
Ron confessed to Harry about asking Fleur Delacour to go to the ball with him. Harry reacted by asking Ron what he did and seemed surprised.
